title: Complete Manual Subtitle Search UI
body:
## Description
Implement a comprehensive manual subtitle search interface similar to Bazarr's implementation.

## Features Required
- Provider selection checkboxes
- Search filters (season, episode, year)
- Result table with scores
- Preview subtitle content
- Download with rename options
- Multi-select for batch operations
- Search history

## UI Mockup
```
[Search Box] [Language Dropdown] [Search Button]

Filters:
[x] OpenSubtitles  [x] Subscene  [x] Addic7ed
[Season] [Episode] [Year] [Release Group]

Results:
| Score | Provider | Name | Language | Downloads | Actions |
|-------|----------|------|----------|-----------|---------|
| 95    | OS       | ...  | English  | 1,234     | Preview/DL |
```

## Backend Requirements
- Parallel provider search
- Result aggregation
- Duplicate detection
- Score calculation
- Preview API endpoint

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Search UI with provider selection
- [ ] Real-time search progress
- [ ] Result sorting and filtering
- [ ] Subtitle preview modal
- [ ] Batch download support
- [ ] Search history persistence
